author: andreypz
body:
#### PR description:

Updating DT Calibration workflows to run in the latest CMSSW releases: 15_0_X and 15_1_X
Details on the workflows are documented here: [CMS/DTCalibrationTools](https://twiki.cern.ch/twiki/bin/viewauth/CMS/DTCalibrationTools)

The updates mainly include minor fixes to a few script to make them run in the latest CMSSW version, and some additional debug print statements.

#### PR validation:

We have run the calibration procedure on one recent Runs and it works as expected.

#### Will be backported to 15_0_X
The backport PR is actually already made here: https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/48107
title: Update DT calibration workflows to work with newest CMSSW releases
